section.p: The temple of Elnir is a single spire reaching skywards. Eagles roost in its lofty belfry - they are sacred to the priests of the Skylord. Elnir is the Divine Ruler of the Heavens, patron of statesmen and kings, and his sons are the stormlords.
‘Thunder is the sound of the Sons of Elnir smiting the cloud demons,’ says a passing peasant.
